feed.title: Anything to chat about today at 21:00 UTC ?

entry.title: Anything to chat about today at 21:00 UTC ?
entry.summary: The discussion revolves around attracting a great Windows developer. One suggestion is to utilize the possibility of free advertising for open source projects on StackOverflow, specifically targeting Windows developers. The link provided leads to a meta StackOverflow post about open source advertising for sidebar 1H 2012. The poster believes that it shouldn't be difficult to get 30 votes with some help from the forum.
